response.overview: Natural sounds...natural beauty...naturally relaxing! Escape into a world of breathtaking beauty as the natural sights and sounds of crashing Pacific surf transports you on a blissful journey of peaceful relaxation. Shot entirely on location along the rugged California, Oregon and Washington coastlines, "Pacific Surf" captures the spectacular natural beauty of giant, crashing waves as they pound the towering cliffs and shoreline of this majestic region! "Pacific Surf" blends a symphony of the naturally soothing sounds of crashing surf with a gentle musical background to create the ultimate stress-reducing natural environment--in the home or office!
response.title: Moodtapes: Pacific Surf
